sourcesContent:
Contact Us

Clinic Location

Student Health Clinic

123 University Avenue

Campus Building 5, Room 101

City, State, ZIP Code

Hours of Operation

Monday - Friday: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM

Saturday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM

Sunday: Closed

Contact Information

Phone: (123) 456-7890

Email: studentclinic@university.edu

Online Appointment Booking

You can also book your appointment online through our appointment scheduling portal.

Emergency Contact

For medical emergencies, please dial 911 or visit the nearest emergency room.

Social Media

Stay connected with us through our social media channels:

  • Facebook
  • Twitter
  • Instagram

Feedback

We value your feedback. Please let us know about your experience at the Student Health Clinic by filling out our feedback form.
